description.value: As a Utilize|XPHB action, you can spill Ball Bearings from their pouch. They spread to cover a level, 10-foot-square area within 10 feet of yourself. A creature that enters this area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or have the Prone|XPHB condition. It takes 10 minutes to recover the Ball Bearings.
